GSD.description:
nvme: fix multipath crash caused by flush request when blktrace is enabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.19 by commit fcd2d199486033223e9b2a6a7f9a01dd0327eac3. For more details please see the references link.
